code: import React,{useState}from'react';import s from'./Login.module.css';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{loginUser}from'../../redux/authSlice/loginSlice';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const[loginForm,setLoginForm]=useState({email:'',password:''});const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setLoginForm(prev=>{return{...prev,[name]:value};});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();dispatch(loginUser(loginForm));console.log('Дані відправлено',loginForm);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:s.section,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:s.title,children:[t('Login')," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:s.loginForm,onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:[t('inputEmail'),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:s.loginInput,type:"email",onChange:handleChange,name:"email",value:loginForm.email,required:true,placeholder:'0501589860'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:[t('inputPass'),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:s.franchiseInput,type:"password",name:"password",onChange:handleChange,value:loginForm.password,required:true,placeholder:'пароль'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.loginBtnWrapper,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:s.loginButton,children:t('Enter')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/registration",className:s.registerButton,children:t('Register')})]})]})]});};export default Login;
